item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 28,make right onto NH49 toward Waterville Valley,when just getting to Waterville Valley,make a left onto Tripoli Road at the sign flashing how fast you are going.Stay to the right on Tripoli Road,when the pavement ends,go 1.5 miles past Mount Osceola Parking Lot,make a right into the East Ponds Trail Parking Lot.We will be hiking the East Ponds Trails to two small pretty ponds.This is a easy hike. 5.0 miles round trip,4 hours estimated time----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: EAST PONDS
